titleStmt.title: His Majesties message to Colonell Goring of Portsmovth wherein hee declares his resolution in coming in person to the said town : likewise the Parliaments instructions to the Earle of Essex concerning Portsmouth : wherein is declared the full power that they have given to the said Eale [sic] for the besieging of the said towne of Portsmouth : with their resolution concerning the Ile of Wight and their determination concerning adjourning the Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: ... Printed for I. H. and T. Rider,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
